example.parse: (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN العصر) (DET+ADJ الصفوي))) (PUNC ,) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS ازدادت) (NP-SBJ (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM قوت) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM السياسية))) (PUNC ,) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بعد) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN اقتراب) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3MP هم)) (NP-MNR (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_ACC اكثر) (CONJ ف) (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_ACC أكثر)) (PP-CLR (PREP من) (NP (NP (PUNC ") (DET+NOUN_PROP الشاهات) (PUNC ") (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_ACCGEN الصفويين)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON الذين)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MP اعتمدوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN العلماء)) (PP (PREP ك) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN أحد) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN أركان) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN حكم) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم)))))))))))))))) (PUNC ,)

arg.g: grew closer to the Safavids Shahs, who relied on scientists as one of the pillars of their rule

example.arg: من الشاهات الصفويين الذين اعتمدوا على العلماء كأحد أركان حكمهم
